name: A Boy And His Perverted Oneesans' Happy H Apartment Life
name_original: A Boy And His Perverted Oneesans' Happy H Apartment Life
description: You play as Jun, a young boy who seeks to become a priest at his grandfather's Shinto temple. However, while his parents are abroad, he moves into an apartment filled with beautiful temptresses. Will Jun be able to stay pure and reach his dreams of becoming a dutiful priest, or will he succumb to the seductions of his neighboring onee-sans?
